GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v6.1.13
GSD.description:
of: reserved_mem: Have kmemleak ignore dynamically allocated reserved mem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit 50b21bba362647b7a8ae71e3e06cf26eeeae2053, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit a7259df7670240ee03b0cfce8a3e5d3773911e24. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: of: reserved_mem: Have kmemleak ignore dynamically allocated reserved mem
